name: Le Chat Noir
description:
"Le Chat Noir" is a game developed by students in 3 weeks.

You can embody Martha SALIS, a young orphan who wants to learn more about the death of its parents by exploring an old burned cabaret in 1912.

The game is inspired by the famous old cabaret "Le Chat Noir" builded in Paris in 1881 by Rodloph SALIS.

You can have a detailed gameplay right here :
